mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (boardId, commentWriter, commentPass, commentContents, likeCount) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentPass}, #{commentContents}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardId, commentWriter, commentPass, commentContents, likeCount, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt FROM comment WHERE boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY id DESC
